modName: Mytha Follower - Standalone - CBBE BBP - SeveNBase BBP - UNP - UNPB BBP
summary: Adds a new standalone follower, Mytha, a fire battlemage.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][color=red][b]REEDING SUX. I know. But if you don't, you're going to be pretty confused. Trust me. And not just because of the requirement (which you probably have installed anyway)...[/b][/color]

[color=orange][b]Credits (in Alphabetical Order)[/b][/color]
[color=orange][u]Assets[/u][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8][b]Caliente[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition - CBBE[/url][/i]
[b]dimon99[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP Female Body[/url][/i]
[b]Elaneith[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118]The Neith Team Warpaints Set[/url][/i]
[b]hellosanta[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url][/i], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327]SG Female Eyebrows[/url][/i], and [i]SG Hairs[/i]
[b]LogRaam[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url][/i]
[b]Mr. Dave[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix[/url][/i]
[b]MrTroubleMaker[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30179]Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB UNPC[/url][/i]
[b]Sevennity[/b], [b]Wast1980[/b], [b]Demonhunter[/b] and [b]Crosscrusade[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992]SeveNBase Body[/url][/i]
[b]Skysims[/b] for [i]SkyHair002[/i]
[b]SvarogNL[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16731]Fitness Body Normal Maps[/url][/i]
[b]tetrodoxin[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841]Freckle Mania[/url][/i]
[b]xp32[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i]
[b]xs2reality[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946]Sporty Sexy Sweat[/url][/i][/color]

[color=orange][u]Other Resources[/u][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8][b]expired6978[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url][/i]
[b]greentea101[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9797]Unfuzer[/url][/i]
[b]natilde[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673]Tutorial - Creating Standalone NPCs[/url][/i]
[b]SydneyB[/b] for [i][url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Using_a_face_made_with_Chargen_Extension_on_an_NPC_for_Skyrim]Tutorial: Using a face made with Chargen Extension on an NPC for Skyrim[/url][/i]
[b]turulo[/b] for [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494]NPC Nif Merge[/url][/i][/color]

[color=orange][b]Permissions[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]You may not translate, modify, convert, or otherwise create a derivative product from this mod, in whole or in part, for public use without the permission of all mod authors whose assets are included in this mod package. You may not upload this mod, or derivative products, anywhere without the permission of all mod authors whose assets are included in this mod.[/color]

[color=orange][b]Requirements[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]This mod adds a mostly-standalone companion to the game. That means that most assets that are required to allow this mod to function are already included in the installation package. Notable exceptions include a BBP-supporting skeleton for the BBP versions of this mod. An example of such a skeleton is the [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url][/i].[/color]

[color=orange][b]Story[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]Let's set this straight: THIS IS AN ADULT-ORIENTED MOD. I know you 12-year-olds are out there. Turn back now! It's not really that adult-oriented, but moreso than most companion mods you'll find.

Now that that's done with, I really suggest that you read this story or else you will be very confused with what is going on in the mod. Mytha was born a Breton, with her Elf heritage being more pronounced. She joined the Companions when she became an adult, but, despite her best efforts, she had a much greater affinity for magic. Now, you know that scene where Njada asks Aela about her affair with Skjor, but Aela and Skjor don't really have a scene that confirms this (instead it's because they've been outside doing werewolf stuff)? Aela's really been having a sexy romance with Mytha. Because of it, Mytha, who's loving every moment of it and not being too subtle about it either, doesn't want to leave for the College.[/color]

[color=orange][b]Usage (Technical Stuff)[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]Mytha can be found in Jorrvaskr. During the day, from 7AM to 9PM, she hangs out in the main hall. Otherwise, she wanders around in the living quarters. When she is around Aela, there is a chance that a scene may start between them, sort of giving you the idea of the Story above. If you're running [i]SexLab[/i], the scene is better, but it's not required and not having it doesn't really make the scene feel awkward, so don't sweat it. To unlock her follower and marriage options, you have to complete her short (kind of weird) quest, which can be started by talking to her and going through the dialogue.

She levels with the player at an equal rate, from 1 to 200. She is a fire magic spellsword who likes heavy armor. She's got a lot of perks (not too many to make her OP in my opinion) so that she won't be triggering and traps and will be fairly compentent with her magic and her one-handed weapons.[/color]

[b][color=orange]Installation[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]This mod is offered with the choice of 4 body types: CBBE BBP, UNP, UNPB BBP, and SeveNBase Bombshell BBP. Choose the one that you prefer Mytha to have. Once the installation package is downloaded, you can use a Mod Manager to install the files, or you can extract the files yourself and merge the files and folders contained within with your Skyrim install's Data folder. Uninstallation may be achieved by removing these installed files.[/color]

[b][color=orange]Version History[/b][/color]
[color=#0ecfe8]v1.0:
- Initial release[/color][/font]
